item.title: China says Japan sent 'shocking' wrong signal on Taiwan
item.description: The row, the biggest China-Japan crisis in years, has spread to trade and cultural relations.

item.title: Bessent believes there won't be a recession in 2026 but says some sectors are challenged
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the U.S. was not at risk of entering a recession in 2026 and that Americans would soon benefit from Trump's poli...

item.title: U.S. senators say Rubio told them Trump’s Ukraine peace plan is Russia’s ‘wish list.’ Rubio denies it
item.description: Lawmakers say Secretary of State Marco Rubio told them Trump's plan for peace in Ukraine is a "wish list" of the Russians.

item.title: Trump officials’ meeting with Russian in Miami spurs questions about latest Ukraine proposal
item.description: The Miami meeting included special envoy Steve Witkoff, Jared Kushner and Kirill Dmitriev, who leads the Russian Direct Investment Fund.

item.title: G20 summit in South Africa adopts declaration despite U.S. boycott, opposition
item.description: A Group of 20 leaders' summit in South Africa adopted a declaration addressing the climate crisis and other global challenges on Saturday.
